readable.title: 3030079705_0dee8a3e89
readable.content: A little girl playing piggyback with her father on a blanket in the park . A little girl with her hands in the air is sitting on a man 's back while he is laying on a blanket . A man lies on a blue blanket with a child on his back . A small girl sitting on a man 's back . The little girl tackles a man and makes the universal sign for " Touchdown ! "
